reference_summary:
Nu-pore Hydrocolloid Pimple Patch - Blemish Patches to care for Blemish Control, scar prevention, must haves tools for skincare. korean makeup trusted cosmetics secret k-beauty. 60 Patches nu-pore {'Brand': 'Nu-pore', 'Item Form': 'Patch', 'Product Benefits': 'Blemish Control', 'Scent': 'Hydrocolloid', 'Skin Type': 'Acne Prone', 'Product Dimensions': '5 x 3 x 3 inches; 1.2 Ounces', 'UPC': '780707702413'} I tend to breakout a lot especially week prior to menstrual period. These pimple patches do a great job in minimizing pimple size and inflammation. I put it on at night before bed and when I wake up in the morning, the pimple is almost gone. It has good adhesion, mine did not come off during sleep. I definitely recommend. Helps minimize inflammation Eggplant Clearing Cleansing Oil Pad 60 pads, Makeup remover pad. Exfoliating. Simple easy quick wipe. Moisturizing cleansing oil pad PAPA RECIPE RIGHT FOR SKIN {'Brand': 'PAPA RECIPE RIGHT FOR SKIN', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '3.98 x 3.82 x 2.72 inches; 10.86 Ounces'} Love these cleansing pads. I typically use fragrance free body oil to remove eye makeup, but was happy to see same thing in a pad. I was worried it would irritate the eyes, but it didn't! I used one pad for both eyes to remove waterproof mascara and eyeliner. No irritation and it took everything off! Definitely recommend! Removes stubborn makeup, even waterproof mascara! Gryph & IvyRose Coat of Arms Hydrating Lotion for Kids - Hydrating Moisturizer with Shea Butter & Coconut Oil - All Natural, Sustainable, Cruelty Free, No Parabens, No Sulfates, Vegan - USA Made - 8oz Gryph & IvyRose {'Brand': 'Gryph & IvyRose', 'Scent': 'Coconut Shea', 'Item Form': 'Lotion', 'Active Ingredients': 'Sweet Almond Oil', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '5.67 x 2.28 x 2.24 inches; 8 Ounces', 'UPC': '856991007210'} This is my third purchase from this brand! I got their shampoo/body wash and conditioner. Their products are amazing and I love the natural ingredients! Lotion is very hydrating for kids skin and has a nice scent. Quick absorbing and leaves skin feeling very soft and smooth. Definitely recommend! Great natural lotion for kids Large Silk Scrunchies For Hair - Tara Sartoria Artisan Handmade Tara Sartoria {'Material': 'Silk', 'Item Form': 'Scrunchie', 'Brand': 'Tara Sartoria', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Number of Pieces': '1', 'Package Dimensions': '4.37 x 3.9 x 0.71 inches; 1.09 Ounces'} These are very beautiful and feel really nice. They do good job holding my medium thick hair. Does not pull on hair. Makes great gift too! Beautiful and soft AllWell Beauty | Moisturizing Exfoliating Botanical Radiant Face and Body Mask | With Red Maple, Safflower, & Lavender | Made in the USA | Vegan, Cruelty-Free | 5 Count, 0.5 Fl. Oz. Travel Packs AllWell AllOver {'Brand': 'AllWell AllOver', 'Product Benefits': 'Moisturizing', 'Scent': 'Lavender', 'Material Type Free': 'Phthalates', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Package Dimensions': '6.26 x 2.6 x 1.06 inches; 3.84 Ounces', 'UPC': '850012824268'} This mask has helped my skin feel soo soft and smooth. It does an excellent job hydrating the skin that it feels so nice. I love that it comes in individual packets as it makes it easier for travel. It also doesn't have funky smell like others I have tried in past, this is important to me. I definitely would recommend! Love it! Solflower SPF 30 Sunscreen Lotion - Broad Spectrum, UVA/UVB Protection - PABA-Free, Oil-Free - 3.36 Fl Oz Solflower {'Scent': 'Aloe Vera', 'Sun Protection Factor': '30 Sun Protection Factor (SPF)', 'Unit Count': '3.36 Fl Oz', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Brand': 'Solflower', 'Package Dimensions': '5.08 x 1.93 x 1.89 inches; 5.93 Ounces', 'Item model number': '860006763404', 'UPC': '860006763404'} Very light sunscreen lotion that goes on smooth and absorbs quickly. Doesn't make my face oily which I like or leave a white cast. Good under makeup as well. Definitely recommend! Great, doesn't leave white cast AllWell Beauty Masking Kit | Moisturizing Exfoliating Botanical Radiant Face and Body Mask | With Red Maple, Safflower, & Lavender | Made in the USA | Vegan, Cruelty-Free | 3.38 Fl Oz. Jar + Applicator (Self Care Kit) AllWell AllOver {'Brand': 'AllWell AllOver', 'Scent': 'Lavender', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Unit Count': '3.38 Ounce', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Product Dimensions': '5.25 x 4.25 x 4.13 inches; 12.31 Ounces', 'UPC': '850012824275'} The product is very thick and doesn’t apply easy. It doesn’t really have a scent feels like mud. It starts drying quickly and starts flaking which causes a mess. The headband is not luxurious as described, its not soft either. I kept product on 20
Mins as it started falling off my face. My skin did feel very hydrated which is a plus. I will use it a few times a week as instructed but not sure I will purchase again.
